Class OptionMenu

java.lang.Object
Account
OptionMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
ATM
public class OptionMenu extends Account
The OptionMenu class provides the menu-driven interface for the ATM, allowing the user to log in, select account types, and perform transactions. It extends the Account class to access account operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    getAccountType()
    Displays options for account types (Checking or Saving) and allows the user to select an account to access or exit the application.
    void
    getChecking()
    Displays options for the checking account, including viewing balance, withdrawing, depositing, and exiting.
    void
    getLogin()
    Handles user login by prompting for customer and PIN numbers.
    void
    getSaving()
    Displays options for the saving account, including viewing balance, withdrawing, depositing, and exiting.

  • Method Details

    • getLogin

      public void getLogin()
      Handles user login by prompting for customer and PIN numbers. Validates the input and directs the user to account selection if login is successful.

    • getAccountType

      public void getAccountType()
      Displays options for account types (Checking or Saving) and allows the user to select an account to access or exit the application.

    • getChecking

      public void getChecking()
      Displays options for the checking account, including viewing balance, withdrawing, depositing, and exiting.

    • getSaving

      public void getSaving()
      Displays options for the saving account, including viewing balance, withdrawing, depositing, and exiting.
